title: thillaana (bhaagEshri)
sahitya:
dhirana dhIm ta dhIm dhirana nAdhru dhru tAni nAdhru dhIm tOm

dhrutIm dhIm dhIm tana dhirana 

(dhira)



anupallavi



taddhina dhina dhIm dhirana dhimi takiTa takiTajam

nAdhru tAni tomdhru tAni jomta jomta jom tadhingiNatom

(dhirana)



caraNam



Poi adanai meyyenru pEshittirinda nI meipporuL onradanai En

marandAi

sheipporuL ellAm avan sheyal enreNNU shivakAmi nEshanai

sabEshanai tudi paNNu



sholkaTTu



dhIm takiTa nom takiTa kiTa taLAngu taka jom jham tanita nom

tarita jhoNu takiTa dhIm dhIm

tatti trkiTa tOmtaka taLAngu jham takiTa jom jom takiTa jhamta nam tari takiTa tarita

nAdru tom drudru tOm taka nanku Dingu takaNaka takataLAngu

takataLAngu takataLAngu taka 

(dhirana)
